answers.answer: Mine did to. It happened mostly when I was sleeping. I'd wake up and start to get feeling back...ugh I hated it. Wasn't as bad with my first just my second. It happened a couple times at work. Just keep a.CLOSE eye on it though. If you face starts swelling tell your doc. It could be Preeclampsia
She checked me already and she doesn't think it's pre eclampsia because it's not that bad. It's just annoying to deal with. Do you know of any ways to help?

question: Is anyone else having problems with these and does anyone know what could help? I talked to my midwife and she said it's nothing to be concerned about because it's common in late pregnancy (I'm 38 weeks). It's just so annoying because my arms fall asleep all the time.
title: Swelling/Bad blood circulation?
